name: Yasir Afzal
text: One of the best chiropractic services in the Huntsville area. Staff is highly professional and nice. Dr Aplin and Dr Hunter are extremely knowledgeable. If you need a quality service with wonderful experience then visit this place.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your experience Yasir! We really appreciate it.

name: Shawn Wolaver
text: What can I say? WOW. Absolutely the best care anywhere. Dr Aplin & his staff go above & beyond. Wonderful relaxing atmosphere, smiling caring staff that makes your day better just by talking to them. Even when you call for an appointment you can "hear" their smiles...you don't get that in a lot of places. That alone is reason enough to go to InVision Chiropractic

resp.text: What can we say but, WOW - thanks so much for the glowing review, Shawn!!! We really appreciate it - and YOU!

name: Jackie Kraft-Johnson
text: Staff are always friendly and professional. Dr Lee joined the practice a few months ago. He is caring, listens to me and competent . I also have utilized a few sessions of Brain tap. This audio session did wonders to calm me during high work stress.

resp.text: We're so glad you've had a great experience with us, Jackie! Thanks for sharing!

name: Kim Piner
text: We’ve been enjoying Dr. Aplin’s chiropractic care for over 20 years. The staff greets us and cares for us efficiently with smiling faces and sincere loving hearts.  Dr. Aplin has helped my healing process go from poor to excellent with innovative and superb consistent neurological chiropractic care.  This is our first go-to place for medical needs outside emergencies  our regular appointments maintain health for the entire family.  Our youngest received care from the time she was three days old. She’s had optimal health from the beginning. We love our chiropractic visits and the relational connection from people who really care.

resp.text: Wow - this is truly why we do what we do. Thank you so much for sharing your family's experience, Kim!!

name: JoAnn Gill
text: Doctor Aplin is a great chiropractor. I don't know how he does it, but he knows how to adjust you by your stance. His adjustments are fast and accurate. Other chiropractors I have gone to cannot adjust me. I walk into his office leaning over and I am standing up straight when I leave. The wait time in the office for your appointment is minimal. I constantly ask him questions concerning health problems and his suggestions are very helpful.

resp.text: We're so happy you're so happy with InVision Chiropractic!! Thank you so much for sharing your experience, JoAnn!

name: Ken Priest
text:
I have been attended by several chiropractic services in this area and across the country. I find that the majority of chiropractors tend to stick with the methods taught by the particular schools they attended. This is not what I look for in a chiropractor or chiropractic services.
I look for forward thinking doctors who have expanded on and are not limited to what they were initially taught. In particular, I look for one who works with kinesiology,  one who is particularly focused on the relationship between the muscles not only with the bones, but with each other and the energy relationship with other factors in our bodies and in our minds and surroundings.
I find Dr. Richard Aplin to be an open minded doctor and practitioner who can learn and grow and think outside the box in order to visualize what is happening within our bodies and respond with corrective/directive measures.
I find him to be the most effective chiropractor for my needs in this geographic area.

resp.text: Thanks for your thorough review, Ken - we really appreciate it!!

name: Larry Masters
text: Dr. Aplin and his entire staff at InVision are all highly professional, knowledgeable, friendly and helpful. The results you receive are life changing.  It's amazing to see what a GOOD chiropractor can do for your well being. Problems I never considered could be delt with by chiropractic care vanished. My wife and I both love InVision.

resp.text: Larry - you are so kind. Providing life-changing results is truly why we are in business - we're so glad you have experienced our passion! Thank you for sharing.

name: David Stagg
text: I have been seeing Dr. Aplin for almost 15 years now. With him keeping my body aligned and teaching me techniques I can do at home.   He and his staff have always been helpful and friendly.  I always fell better when I leave.

resp.text: Your commitment to health is exemplary, David! Thanks for sharing!

name: rosanna armstrong
text: Dr.in is very talented, Personable and thorough. I have recommended him to friends and colleagues. The office staff is helpful and friendly. He is reasonably priced.

resp.text: We really appreciate your recommendations, Rosanna! Thanks so much.

name: Undrell Thatch
text: InVision Chiropractic has help me so much with just feeling better mentally. I use to have anxiety really bad.  Also it has help me feel better physically.  I had been limping for about 4 months and the pain in my heal was excruciating but Dr. Alpin told me what to do and I followed his instructions and I am walking better with less pain.  Thanks So Much To him and his wonderful staff.

resp.text: We LOVE this! Thanks so much for sharing your 5-star experience!

name: Debbie Cobb
text: Dr Aplin is a great doctor. Everyone at the office is so nice and friendly. I would highly recommend anyone who needs their services to use them.

resp.text: It's easy to be nice and friendly with patients as nice and friendly as you, Debbie! Thanks for sharing your experience.

name: Dee Waugh
text:
I’ve been going to inVision chiropractic for 12 years I believe.
The staff is great and very friendly.
Dr Aplin is so Awesome !
The first time I went I was scared to death.
He made me feel at ease and I’ve been going back ever since.
I love the way I feel when I walk out the door!

resp.text: We're so glad you faced down your fear and came to see us, Dee! What a blessing you are - thanks for sharing!!

name: James Franchini
text:
I was partially paralyze when I was 24, and have utilized many healing and body work modalities for the past 40 years to not only recover, but stay healthy and mostly pain free.
Of all the chiropractors I've worked with, Invision Chiropractic and the neurological chiropractics model they follow, has been BY FAR, the most effective approach I have been involved with....  I have broken through a 20 year "plateau" and am experiencing a new level of sustained healing and subsequent ease with less pain in my body.  Im so glad I found them!

resp.text: Wow - that is one powerful story, James!! We're so grateful to be a part of your tremendous healing. Thank you for sharing!!

name: Jay Byham
text: I have learned so much from Dr. Aplin and I always get helpful advice and insights into my health. They are friendly and accommodating. I have never left that office without experiencing comfort and having my spirit lifted.

resp.text: We LOVE reading your review, Jay! Thanks so much for sharing your experience!

name: Mandy Bedingfield
text: Getting adjusted is like a deeply refreshing breath of air! Dr. Aplin and his team graciously share their knowledge of health and it is affecting our community for the better!

resp.text: What an amazing compliment, Mandy - thank you so much for sharing!

name: Jordan Lee
text: Dr. Aplin, Dr. Lee and their staff is unmatched. You will not find a more caring and trustworthy staff. They are so knowledgeable and take the time to explain to their patients about diagnoses. Thank you Invison Chiropractic!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Jordan! We're so glad our commitment to excellence shows through. We appreciate you!

name: Julie Bloom
text:
I am not only thrilled with Dr. Aplin's expertise, his more "holistic" approach, and insight into the neurological system, I love his staff!
They are friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable, as well.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your experience, Julie!! We appreciate your 5-star review!

name: Sarita Humphrey
text: Dr, Aplin in very intuitive when it comes with patient care. The staff he has working with his are all amazing and kind.

resp.text: Sarita, thank you for your wonderful review! We appreciate it - and YOU!

name: Tommy Davis
text: I have been under Dr Aplin’s care for over 6 months and  noticed improvement immediately. Balance improved and a lot of the pain I was experiencing improved. I would definitely recommend Dr Aplin for your chiropractic needs.

resp.text: Thanks for recommending us, Tommy! We're so happy with your progress - thanks for sharing!

name: Amy Steele
text: I began going to Dr. Aplin about fifteen years ago for debilitating pain in my lower back, a pinched nerve between my shoulder blades and possible carpal tunnel. He straighten me out and has adjusted me through pregnancies and occasional injuries. Dr. Aplin has adjusted my children and several family members see him as well. I appreciate his experience and passion for injury care, preventative maintenance, and overall health of his patients.

resp.text: We're so grateful for your commitment to health, Amy! Thanks for sharing your experience!!

name: Veronica Dennis
text: Dr. Aplin is the best chiropractor I have been too. His wholistic approach helped me overcome a recurrent neck pain.He was very patient and he explained every action. If you have a persistent issue he is the doctor to call.

resp.text: We're so glad we've been able to help you overcome your neck pain, Veronica! Thanks for sharing your experience.

name: Kevin Coleman
text: Super great Dr and staff. Dr Aplin is good to help you understand what is wrong and how to make the necessary changes that will bring better health.

resp.text: We're so glad we've been able to help you obtain better health, Kevin! Thanks for the 5-star review!

name: D. Edwards
text: Dr. Aplin and his team are very caring and knowledgable.  Thank you for being a part of our journey to a healthier lifestyle.

resp.text: We're so privileged to be a part of your health journey!! Thanks for sharing your experience.

name: Sheryl Allen
text: Dr. Aplin and Dr. Lee are fantastic, caring people with their patient's wellness at heart. I have severe scoliosis and Dr. Aplin has helped me tremendously. Both my husband and I see them on a regular basis. I also can't say enough nice thins about the staff as well.

resp.text: We think you're pretty fantastic yourself, Sheryl! Thanks for sharing your experience!

name: Mary Ingram
text: I really like Dr. Aplin's approach and extensive knowledge. I would recommend!

resp.text: Thank so much for recommending us!!

name: amber robillard
text: Friendly & knowledgable staff works alongside Dr. Aplin to bring relief to all my aches & pains.  The addition of brain tapping has brought much needed relief of stress.  Thank you!

resp.text: Love to hear that, Amber! Thanks so much for sharing your 5-star review!

name: Barbara Cooper
text: I had back pain & I didn't think anything short of surgery would help me. My daughter-in-law convinced me to see Dr. Aplin. I wish I had given in 20 years ago. I don't want to ever have to give up this form of help. I can walk without pain now whereas the pain was so bad I could barely make 50 feet before pain. I now have orthotics that are a great help in alleviating my pain. Dr. Aplin is very knowledgable and caring as well as an expert in chiropractic care. Dr Aplin's staff are friendly, considerate, informative, and very efficient - it's a great organization!!

resp.text: This just made my day, Barbara!! Thank you so much for sharing - it's truly why we do what we do.

name: kim brooks
text: Love Dr. Aplin and his staff!! I have had the best experience when it comes to chiropractic care from Invision Chiropractic!!! Dr. Aplin is extremely knowledgeable in his field of chiropractic..I would recommend him to everyone that's having any issues with back and neurological issues. He has even fixed my sinus issues!! Thank you Dr. Aplin

resp.text: We love being able to help you get healthy, Kim! Thanks for sharing your experience!

name: Victoria Jones
text: Dr Aplin and his staff were amazing. I suffered from migraines and he helped me. I wish he were here in South Alabama bc I need him again!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the 5-star review, Victoria! Wish you were here still too!

name: L Norman
text:
Dr.Aplin is the best.
The entire staff is courteous and caring.

resp.text: And we think you're the BEST! Thanks so much for leaving a 5-star review!

His simple truths, technics, in combinations with  xrays, soon put me in working recovery condition and back on my feet.  Invision Chiropractic, in combination with an incediable staff, are always there to help anyone that wants to be helped.  I will always be depended on Invision Chiropractic and Dr. Richard Apine. text: I have been a patient of Dr Aplin’s  for probably over 20 years and I am very crateful for His help that has allowed me maintain my health for so long.

name: Delineliz Zayas
text: Very professional. Educative sessions. Friendly staff.

name: Kassi Koon

name: Mary Daniels
text: I’m a person that deals with fibromyalgia depression acid reflux going to this establishment has truly changed my life I do recommend this tile practice establishment because I know what they have done for me Dr. Alpine has really changed my life

name: Jonathan Wade
text: I've been seeing Dr. Aplin for a little over 10 years. I don't think there is anyone more qualified or better at his craft in this area. He has been nothing but helpful in every situation that has arose. The staff is nice and treats everyone like family too, which is always a bonus.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jonathan! We're so glad to have you as a patient and love being a part of your health journey.

name: David Williams
text: David and I have been patients of Dr. Aplin for many years! He is an expert in his field of treatment. Brain Tap helped while I was recovering from an auto accident last year. Mary Williams

resp.text: We're so glad BrainTap has helped you recover from your accident, Mary. Thanks for sharing your experience!

name: Bev Gallegos
text: I've been going to chiropractors since 1981 throughout 4 states and 6 cities and I've never had a chiropractor like Dr. Aplin.  I've always known and promoted the benefits of regular chiropractic care, but Dr. Aplin is the first doctor to help me understand "capacity" and what that means to my overall health and well being.  After 3 years I still learn from him and his amazing staff.  I look forward to every visit.

resp.text: Bev, it is a pleasure to have you as a patient. Thank you for the 5 star review!

name: Crista Meeks
text: Positive experience for my son!!

resp.text: We're so glad - thanks for sharing, Crista!

name: A Todd Baker
text: We are most fortunate to have a Chiropractor's Chiropractor that is internationally known and respected right here in Huntsville, Al. Our family is  very well pleased with our results and the service Dr. Aplin and staff provide.

resp.text: A Todd Baker - thank you so much for the glowing review! We are fortunate to have YOU for a patient!

name: Lorren Bailey
text:
This is a long review but worth the read.

Dr. Aplin is an amazing doctor! He takes chiropractor care to levels no one has ever heard of in this town. Let's be real for a moment, almost every who's had pain at some point in their life has gone to a chiropractor for help. The standard way of thinking is that if you could just get that elbow to pop back or to have a hip or shoulder reset then all your pain would go away. But it never works, you might find some mild relief but it's usually short lived by a couple of hours to maybe days and then you wake up and say, you slept wrong and it's out again.

Well the team at Invision chiropractic care will teach you how to do address the underlying problems so you can fix it yourself in the long run. Yes you will get adjusted, yes it will probably hurt (Dr. Aplin has a different approach to adjusting that I've ever seen) but I'm a walking, breathing, significantly less pain and overall stress less person than when I walked into his office 4 months ago.

I'll be honest, I have a long history of surgeries to pains and only walked in to this office cause I didn't want to have another surgery and my dear friend suggested Dr. Aplin. I went when I truly didn't believe he was helping. I went when the pain spread to a neighboring body part. I went even though my TOC doc said I needed surgery to fix my problem. 4 months and I never missed an appointment. I can say today that I don't need surgery, my pain is gone and the results of becoming less stressed and worry free was worth more to me than the pain getting better.

BrainTap. Google it. Dr. Aplin introduced me to it and has changed my life because of it. I feel like I have the answer to a life long question that I know so many of us ask "How do I feel better?" yes that's generic but let's be honest, everyone is stressing about something these days. But after 4 months of using the BrainTap and doing my homework from Dr. Aplin, I do feel better, lighter able to take on what the world throws at me. It just works!!

resp.text: Lorren - you're a ROCKSTAR! Thanks for being a great patient and showing what you can achieve through commitment and prioritizing your health. We're thankful for you!

name: Levi Harper
text: I have thoroughly enjoyed coming here. Dr. Aplin is very straightforward with what his intentions are and why he feels they are necessary. Any time I have had a "catch" or aching area he is able to relieve it and suggest preventive measures for it not to happen again. Also the staff is great and seem to genuinely care about the patients. I am done with treatments and I get phone calls asking (not pressing) if I would like to come in but also just to see how I am doing. Would recommend if you are looking for a Chiropractor.

name: Deanna Wood
text: Excellent care. Little or no waiting at appointment time. Highly recommend. Many issues I’ve had have been resolved through Dr. Aplin’s care, when I couldn’t find answers elsewhere. The staff is very caring and personable.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your experience, Deanna! We're so glad we've been able to help you when you hadn't found answers other places.

name: jim hatfield
text: Dr. Aplin is the best chiropractor I have ever been treated by. I have used several while living in other states due to injuries I received from an accident and Aplin is better than all the others. He treats the problem and not the symptom, while also caring about the patient. I nicknamed him Jesus, and have recommended his services to everyone I meet for their needs of treatment. If you need any chiropractic help, go to him.

name: Brian Moore (Armyballer)
text: An interesting approach to pain, I was skeptical at first but it does work.

name: Theresa Lawson
text: Great! Wonderful practice with expert Doctor. I have seen Dr. Aplin for many years and he always takes care of the problem and gets you back on track.

resp.text: We're so glad to have been your provider for so many years. Thanks for sharing your experience!

name: Ashley Dillon
text: Dr. Aplin and his staff truly care about your health and your family's. They are always patient and answer any questions or concerns I have including the one's my children ask.

name: Jaroslav Onuszkanycz
text: With every visit I fell better and better

name: Bobby Snellgrove-Fitch
text: Dr. Z took my husband that could barely walk upright and he was able to walk upright with no pain. We recommend Dr. Z to everyone because he truly cares about you and your health and quality of life!!! A++++ all the way!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review Bobby!

name: Cathy Solis
text: Dr. Zlotea is a very caring individual who believes in natural healing. I will return.

name: Lisa Mixon
text: Awesome doctor and staff! Not only does Dr. Z help you get better, he teaches you techniques to practice at home. I am very pleased with my experience and encourage anyone to give these folks a try. Thank you MedPlus for all you do!

resp.text: So happy that you are feeling better Lisa. Thank you for your review!

name: Trevor Wells
text: Had two herniated disks. Did the decompression sessions and it worked miracles! Got my inlaws and my wife to come here because not only is the dr great he is honest with you and wants the best for you. It’s not all about the money with him. And the staff are amazing!!

resp.text: Thank you Trevor, We are so happy you are feeling better and thank you for the referrals...patient referrals are the best compliment!

name: Wendella Johnson
text: After my second visit I noticed I was able to breath better. This is my third visit and everybody has been amazing and supportive

resp.text: So happy you are doing better Wendella. Thank you for the review

name: LaLa Coates
text: I absolutely cannot express how much I appreciate Dr. Z and Bre, recently I lost my Father and my best friend, they offer ERT( emotional relief therapy) accupuncture and so many more services that are tailored to your needs. Very very knowledgeable and dont just try and shove medicine down your throat,  Dr. Z goes above and beyond to help you. My experience especially during this time in my life has been a God sent

resp.text: Thank you Lara for the review. So happy you are doing better.

name: Jonathan L.
text: Extremely knowledgeable and skilled, Dr. Z is an amazing chiropractor. Having been to several different chiropractors over the years he's definitely the best. Highly recommended!!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Jonathan.

name: Brittany Boehme
text: For the first time in my life I am medication/prescription free and have been able to correct many bodily and mental issues through the gentle chiropractic and ERT care received here with Dr. Z and his staff. this office has helped alleviate and correct issues from decades ago in just a few months without drugs. The office does come off at first as chaotic, a little unorganized, and rushed HOWEVER I recommend this place to everyone despite that because it is the only time I have seen and felt relief in my body and mind. I've seen multiple doctors, been on every medication under the sun, and even had surgeries, none of which ever actually corrected my underlying issues and at most only suppressed the pain temporarily.

resp.text: So happy you are better Brittany!

name: Christopher Edwards
text: I have been a patient at Medplus for over a year now. I first came to them with debilitating back pain from a work related injury, and they were able to see me the day I called and had me mostly pain free within a week. As a chiropractic patient for my whole life, I can tell you that the care is first rate! The office is also very accommodating when you need to reschedule, and the wait times are generally very reasonable. Highly recommended!!

resp.text: Thank you Christopher for your review.

name: Joseph Clark
text: Became a patient here after an car accident. From my very first appointment, I was well taken care of. The staff is amazing and they genuinely believe in what they do. They educate you, work with your schedule, and above all, they really do care about you and your health on a personal level. Medplus truly stands apart from other chiropractic clinics.

resp.text: Thank you for the nice review Joseph.

name: Latoiya Chapman
text: new patient. visiting family in the area for the holidays. Someone at Southeast Health circle E. Rehab heard me talking with my mom and suggested Dr. Z. (my Thanksgiving miracle).  I was in so much pain and got relief by the end of my treatment. Thank you GOD for putting them all in my life today. Awesome staff. Very clean and relaxing facility. The prices are reasonable and they also have packages for payment/ treatment plans.

resp.text: Thank you Latoiya!

name: James DeWick
text: Came in to do stem cells thinking that it would be my only option for relieving chronic pain in my knees. Dr Z gave me an examination and a chiropractic session that relieved most if not all of the pain in my knees instantly. Now we are doing blood work and other tests to determine underlying causes of this issue. I’m very happy I went with Dr Z because he’s a truly honest and caring person. Thank you !

name: Jamie Ward
text: The personnel are very friendly. When I walked in and heard the 70’s light rock over the sound system I knew this was my kind of place. I went in for lower back pain that kept me nearly immobile for a week. I came here after reading the reviews, desperate for relief. I felt great after my initial visit and with my continuing therapy feeling better each day. I’m also learning a lot from the doc about my health and how to maintain it without pharmaceuticals.

resp.text: Glad to hear you are feeling better Jamie, Thank you for the nice review!

name: James Avery
text: Dr. Z is amazing and acupuncture works! I no longer have to suffer through near constant nerve pain. Dr. Z listens carefully to symptoms and issues and treats accordingly. Through incredible ancient practice, he is teaching my body how to heal itself. I recommend Medplus to anyone for any aliment or struggle you face.

resp.text: So happy you are feeling better James.

name: Johanna Lodder
text:
I was in a car accident, ended up with neck fusion herniated disc, lots of pain.  Considering I never used a primary care doctor before this because I didn't need one, went to gynecologist yearly, that was it. Suddenly it was lots of doctors tests etc.  Spent the last two years with orthopedic, chiropractors, muscular therapists but still in pain, still not able to sleep well.   Pain changes you....but I wasn't going to give up yet. My primary care Dr. recommended Lions Mane and Dr Z. Ordered the supplement on Amazon started taking it, it really helped with brain fog from concussion. So I headed off to Dr Z, not expecting too much, I was already seeing a chropracter.  Wow, what a difference, decompression has reduced the nagging pain, the first morning after, I woke up because I was rested!  Hadn't done that since...before accident.  I get up now in the morning and can feel my feet, and walk normally, not like I have flippers.  I had ligaments and muscles whining and complaining, because now my hips were staying where they should and everything had to stretch.  But I did my stretches and my ankles and left leg aren't hurting like they did.
I am actually thinking about exercising again,  this experience has made me hopefull again.  Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review and I am so happy that you are doing so much better!

name: Jasmine Mathis
text: It's easy to integrate a holistic view of heath here. The environment here feels like you are amongst friends, not a sterile impersonal place to churn through "patients".  Doc Z and staff are genuine and show they care in every way!

resp.text: We appreciate the positive review Jasmine.

name: Cathy Solis
text: Dr. Zlotea is a very caring individual who believes in natural healing. I will return.

name: Keely Stokes
text: Such a smart man!! Genuinely cares. My family loves this place!!! The lady who runs the front desk is so sweet, also. They have a prayer jar at the check out... I loved that. Highly recommend

name: Johnny Brascom
text: If you are tired of getting the run around about your health conditions, allow Medplus to give you the treatment that can help you with your condition. Since 1995, I have no regrets about the care that I received. Many others clients that I personally recommend Medplus to, I said some of the same things. Find someone who have been there, and ask them for yourself. Word of mouth is the best advertising a business can get.

resp.text: Thank you Johnny

name: Keely Stokes
text: Such a smart man!! Genuinely cares. My family loves this place!!! The lady who runs the front desk is so sweet, also. They have a prayer jar at the check out... I loved that. Highly recommend

name: Victoria Lewis
text: Dr. Z is very kind and caring, but more importantly great at getting the results in the treatment plan.  Definitely recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for that positive review Victoria, we appreciate that!

name: Ronnie Creel
text: I have been to numerous chiropractors over the years...Dr. Z has been the most effective chiropractor that I have used. I highly recommend him.

resp.text: Thank you Ronnie!

name: Michael Parker
text: A great experience, and I'm starting to feel much better than before I visited them. I always feel comfortable in their care.

name: Joe Schmitt
text: Dr Zlotea took the time to understand my condition and developed a plan that works for me.  I would recommend him highly.

resp.text: Thank you Joe.

name: Donielle McLendon
text:
I injured myself almost 4 years ago. My left foot and sciatic nerve have caused me to be in almost constant pain since. Before the injury, I ran about 30-45 miles per week, but I have not been able to workout with any regularity since, and it was depressing. I have seen 2 orthopedic surgeons, another chiropractor, a podiatrist, an acupuncturist (a different practice), and massage therapists with little relief. It’s not that they were bad, but they weren’t looking in the right place. He really listened to me and I appreciate that.
Dr. Zlotea has been treating me for the past few weeks for a herniated disc and other issues. He recommended using decompression therapy and it has worked wonders! I don’t think I would have been able to workout again if not for him. I’m only 32 and finally don’t feel like I’m 102. I am able to start light exercise again as of today and I couldn’t be happier! My foot doesn’t hurt at all anymore! I feel like I’m getting my life back.

name: Brandon Glover
text: I get treated every chance I get, Dr. Z is great and the staff are friendly and professional! 10/10 would recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Brandon!

name: Angela Lewis
text: Nicest group of people who worked with me in every step. Would recommend to everyone

resp.text: Thank you Angela!

name: Kendall Jackson
text:
As some of you may remember, in November 2011 I was involved in a vehicular hit and run on Ross Clark Circle, in which I was a pedestrian. To give you an idea of the impact, it fragmented my tibia and fibula in half (lower leg bones). I incurred a lot of bodily damage. At one point I could barely walk due to the various pains due to misalignment. The photo attached shows how much of my skin was removed by the ground, although and I was wearing a pea coat at the time of the incident. To keep things short, I'm less afraid of vehicles passing me on my morning runs than I am to try a new chiropractor. I love the down-to-Earth atmosphere at his office. I strongly recommend you at least give it a few visits to see if his structure is right for you. It only took me ONCE.

Thank you Dr. Z

Kendall Jackson

name: Kendall Jackson
text:
As some of you may remember, in November 2011 I was involved in a vehicular hit and run on Ross Clark Circle, in which I was a pedestrian. To give you an idea of the impact, it fragmented my tibia and fibula in half (lower leg bones). I incurred a lot of bodily damage. At one point I could barely walk due to the various pains due to misalignment. The photo attached shows how much of my skin was removed by the ground, although and I was wearing a pea coat at the time of the incident. To keep things short, I'm less afraid of vehicles passing me on my morning runs than I am to try a new chiropractor. I love the down-to-Earth atmosphere at his office. I strongly recommend you at least give it a few visits to see if his structure is right for you. It only took me ONCE.

Thank you Dr. Z

Kendall Jackson

name: Lisa Boulden
text: When I walked into Dr Z office I was in so much pain for the last 9 yrs and unable to sleep all night. With the help of Dr Z help I'm able to sleep all night and in a lot less back pain. He knew what was really wrong with me and is treating me where all the pain Drs and others was treating me for the wrong problem. Thank Dr Z and the staff.

resp.text: I am so happy you are feeling better! Thank you for the nice review.

name: Lulu
text: Dr Z is very knowledgeable and has a great bed side manner.   I highly recommend this business for all of your chiropractic and alternative med needs .

name: Michael Rivera
text: Had really bad lower back pain and normally I get an injection, but decided to try this place. After 2 adjustments from Dr. Zlotea I was back to work.

resp.text: Glad you are feeling better Michael. Thank you for the review.

name: Southern storage fanatics SSF Love
text: This non surgical procedures have changed my life and set me on a new back pain free journey I feel so much better thank you doctor z .

name: Stephanie Graves
text: Absolutely amazing ..... the difference in the pain levels in my back and shoulders after the first visit were undeniable and it just keeps getting better!!! Thank you sooo much Dr. Z and Bree for taking my feel good levels to the next level!!

name: Steven King
text: Not what I expected, saw him as an alternative health doctor for a holistic approach to ADHD expecting a blood test and diet change with some supplements and ended up leaving with only a $37 wrist band that plugs into an electrical outlet ground and some hemp drops! Total visit was $137. Also he was very quick to make sure he suggests treatments for the whole family for everything and anything to capitalize on the money. Saw him on a Wednesday and he wanted me right back in on Monday. No thanks.

name: Melissa Jasso
text: Very knowledgeable doctor and really helped out my back pain after a car crash! Super friendly staff!!

resp.text: Thanks Melissa!

name: Courtney Hobgood
text: I paid 96 dollars to be told I need to take only herbs and supplements to help get pregnant. If you are going through IVF treatment do not go here.

name: Angela Lewis
text: Great service I always leave feeling  so much better.  Dr Z and his staff take great care of there  patients.

name: Marie Czyzewski
text: A Dr. that really cares and is there when you need him! He even came to our house and the hospital! Thank you so much! Hard to find such a place...

name: allfr miss
text:
I had a car accident back in September. I was so bad injured I couldn't move a thing. It took 2 visits to be actually able to move and another 3 to able to do sit ups. If it wasnt for dr. Z i wouldnt be working today. He helped me getting me back on feet. It may seem pricey but he is actually affordable and he will work with you.
You can see him about anything and he will help you!

name: Chrys D
text: Dr.Z is amazing and attentive. I came in with severe back/neck/sciatic pains and constant headaches, all of which are nearly non-existent now!

name: Courtney Hobgood
text: I paid 96 dollars to be told I need to take only herbs and supplements to help get pregnant. If you are going through IVF treatment do not go here.

name: Erin Caputo
text: Absolutely love this place. Dr. Z is very good at what he does! Everyone in the office is just super kind. Trust the process and trust in your ability to heal and the work he does on you whether it be chiropractic, acupuncture, ERT (energy clearing) or otherwise will be truly life changing. At first the ERT may seem silly, but let me tell you!.. I've done energy work before as its practiced often in my field of work, and he really has a wonderful knack for it and has helped me work out years and lifetimes of negative emotion that was holding me back! I highly recommend this place just the same as I would recommend a spa or retreat. I even got my husband to go now! Dont wait on your health and well-being, your absolutely worth it!

name: Anna Valentine
text: No clue who these people are but they deserve a 5 star

name: rodel pasibe
text: Got relief after the first visit, now my whole family goes for adjustments. Highly recommend.

name: Gladys Rudd
text: Love these people!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Rudd, we love you too!

name: Josue Jasso
text: Good place

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: JJ M
text: This Dr. is nutts!

name: Charlie Crowe
text: I was a little disappointed with my visit. Before I had done the in take paper work as a new patient we were talking about  12 visit plan. I didn’t feel that I was heard. There seemed to be an agenda other than my condition. I will say that they had me in and out fast.

resp.text:
Thank you for your review. Your input is appreciated.
Your perspective on the first visit is different than most of our patients but significant. The intake paperwork asks the patient to list all their symptoms and quantify their health complaints and instructs the patients to quantify their level of improvement over the next 12 treatments.... That is correct. The reason the paperwork addresses a treatment plan is so patients are aware from the beginning that holistic treatment is not a one treatment panacea, it's not a pill and it's not magic. It is a healing process and the specifics are handled individually with each patient.
A 20 minutes face to face with a physician is unheard of these days and if you feel that was a short visit so be it. In a 20-minute visit we addressed the entire human frame above and beyond the chief complaint plus acupuncture and tongue analysis. The process didn't stop when you left the office but it continued as the tongue analysis was performed by OUM physicians in California and THERE WERE THREE EMAIL CONVERSATIONS REGARDING THE SPECIFICS. That was a step I take out of true concern for the health and well-being of my patients but it's cases like these that make excellent physicians become callus.
Best of luck on your journey and next time find something to praise about the next person that gives a damn about your health and well-being
